text: Waarschoot is a former municipality in the Belgian province of East Flanders. On 1 January 2019, Lovendegem, Waarschoot and Zomergem were merged into the new municipality of Lievegem. In 2007, 7756 people lived there. It is at 51° 09 North, 03° 36 East. == References == Category:Former municipalities of East Flanders
title: Waarschoot
